@page "/buttons/keyboard-navigation"

@using Syncfusion.Blazor.SplitButtons
@using Syncfusion.Blazor.Buttons
@*Hidden:Lines*@
@inherits SampleBaseComponent
@*End:Hidden*@

<ActionDescription>
<p>
    This sample demonstrates keyboard interactions of the Button components. Various key combinations can be used to interact with Button components efficiently.
  </p>
  <p>
    <strong>Focus Navigation:</strong>
  </p>
  <ul>
    <li><span class="key-class"><kbd>Alt</kbd> + <kbd>J</kbd></span> — Focuses on the first component of the demo</li>
  </ul>
  <p>
    <strong>Checkbox:</strong>
  </p>
  <ul>
    <li><span class="key-class"><kbd>Space</kbd></span> — Toggles the checkbox state when focused</li>
  </ul>
  <p>
    <strong>Toggle Switch Button:</strong>
  </p>
  <ul>
    <li><span class="key-class"><kbd>Space</kbd></span> — Toggles the switch state when focused</li>
  </ul>
  <p>
    <strong>Radio Button:</strong>
  </p>
  <ul>
    <li><span class="key-class"><kbd>Arrow Keys</kbd></span> — Activates the next or previous radio button in the group</li>
  </ul>
  <p>
    <strong>Button Group:</strong>
  </p>
  <p><em>Single Selection:</em></p>
  <ul>
    <li><span class="key-class"><kbd>Tab</kbd></span> — Focuses the active button</li>
    <li><span class="key-class"><kbd>Arrow Keys</kbd></span> — Activates the next or previous button</li>
  </ul>
  <p><em>Multiple Selection:</em></p>
  <ul>
    <li><span class="key-class"><kbd>Tab</kbd></span> — Focuses the next button</li>
    <li><span class="key-class"><kbd>Space</kbd></span> — Activates the focused button</li>
  </ul>
  <p>
    <strong>Dropdown Menu & Split Button:</strong>
  </p>
  <ul>
    <li><span class="key-class"><kbd>Esc</kbd></span> — Closes the opened popup</li>
    <li><span class="key-class"><kbd>Enter</kbd></span> — Opens the popup or activates the highlighted item</li>
    <li><span class="key-class"><kbd>Space</kbd></span> — Opens the popup</li>
    <li><span class="key-class"><kbd>Up Arrow</kbd></span> — Navigates to the previous action item</li>
    <li><span class="key-class"><kbd>Down Arrow</kbd></span> — Navigates to the next action item</li>
    <li><span class="key-class"><kbd>Alt</kbd> + <kbd>Up Arrow</kbd></span> — Closes the popup</li>
    <li><span class="key-class"><kbd>Alt</kbd> + <kbd>Down Arrow</kbd></span> — Opens the popup</li>
  </ul>
</ActionDescription>


<div class="control-section e-button-section">
    <div class="button-section">
        <div id="button-control">
            <div class="row">
                <div class="col-xs-6 col-sm-6 col-lg-6 col-md-6">
                    <div class="col-xs-12 col-sm-12 col-lg-6 col-md-6">
                        <h5>Checkbox</h5>
                    </div>
                    <div class="col-xs-12 col-sm-12 col-lg-6 col-md-6">
                        <SfCheckBox @bind-Checked="IsChecked"></SfCheckBox><br />
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
            <div class="row">
                <div class="col-xs-6 col-sm-6 col-lg-6 col-md-6">
                    <div class="col-xs-12 col-sm-12 col-lg-6 col-md-6">
                        <h5>Toggle Switch Button</h5>
                    </div>
                    <div class="col-xs-12 col-sm-12 col-lg-6 col-md-6">
                        <SfSwitch @bind-Checked="IsToggleSwitchOn"></SfSwitch>

                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
            <div class="row">
                <div class="col-xs-6 col-sm-6 col-lg-6 col-md-6">
                    <div class="col-xs-12 col-sm-12 col-lg-6 col-md-6">
                        <h5>Radio Button</h5>
                    </div>
                    <div class="col-xs-12 col-sm-12 col-lg-6 col-md-6">
                        <div style="display: inline-block; padding-right: 10px;">
                            <SfRadioButton Label="Credit Card" Name="payment" Value="credit" Checked="@SelectedPaymentMethod" aria-label="Select Credit Card payment method">
                            </SfRadioButton>
                        </div>
                        <div style="display: inline-block;">
                            <SfRadioButton Label="Debit Card" Name="payment" Value="debit" Checked="@SelectedPaymentMethod" aria-label="Select Debit Card payment method">
                            </SfRadioButton>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
            <div class="row">
                <div class="col-xs-6 col-sm-6 col-lg-6 col-md-6">
                    <div class="col-xs-12 col-sm-12 col-lg-6 col-md-6">
                        <h5>Button Group</h5>
                    </div>
                    <div class="col-xs-12 col-sm-12 col-lg-6 col-md-6">
                        <h5>Single Selection</h5>
                        <SfButtonGroup Mode="SelectionMode.Single">
                            <ButtonGroupButton>LEFT</ButtonGroupButton>
                            <ButtonGroupButton>CENTER</ButtonGroupButton>
                            <ButtonGroupButton>RIGHT</ButtonGroupButton>
                        </SfButtonGroup>

                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
            <div class="row">
                <div class="col-xs-6 col-sm-6 col-lg-6 col-md-6">
                    <div class="col-xs-12 col-sm-12 col-lg-6 col-md-6">

                    </div>
                    <div class="col-xs-12 col-sm-12 col-lg-6 col-md-6">
                        <h5>Multiple Selection</h5>
                        <SfButtonGroup Mode="SelectionMode.Multiple">
                            <ButtonGroupButton>BOLD</ButtonGroupButton>
                            <ButtonGroupButton>ITALIC</ButtonGroupButton>
                            <ButtonGroupButton>UNDERLINE</ButtonGroupButton>
                        </SfButtonGroup>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
            <div class="row">
                <div class="col-xs-6 col-sm-6 col-lg-6 col-md-6">
                    <div class="col-xs-12 col-sm-12 col-lg-6 col-md-6">
                        <h5>Split Button</h5>
                    </div>
                    <div class="col-xs-12 col-sm-12 col-lg-6 col-md-6">
                        <SfSplitButton Content="Paste">
                            <DropDownMenuItems>
                                <DropDownMenuItem Text="Paste"></DropDownMenuItem>
                                <DropDownMenuItem Text="Paste Special"></DropDownMenuItem>
                                <DropDownMenuItem Text="Paste as Formula"></DropDownMenuItem>
                                <DropDownMenuItem Text="Paste as Hyperlink"></DropDownMenuItem>
                            </DropDownMenuItems>
                        </SfSplitButton>

                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
            <div class="row">
                <div class="col-xs-6 col-sm-6 col-lg-6 col-md-6">
                    <div class="col-xs-12 col-sm-12 col-lg-6 col-md-6">
                        <h5>Dropdown Menu</h5>
                    </div>
                    <div class="col-xs-12 col-sm-12 col-lg-6 col-md-6">
                        <SfDropDownButton Content="Profile">
                            <DropDownMenuItems>
                                <DropDownMenuItem Text="Dashboard"></DropDownMenuItem>
                                <DropDownMenuItem Text="Notifications"></DropDownMenuItem>
                                <DropDownMenuItem Text="User Settings"></DropDownMenuItem>
                                <DropDownMenuItem Text="Log Out"></DropDownMenuItem>
                            </DropDownMenuItems>
                        </SfDropDownButton>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>

@code
{
    /// <summary>
    /// Gets or sets whether the checkbox is checked
    /// </summary>
    private bool IsChecked { get; set; } = true;

    /// <summary>
    /// Gets or sets whether the toggle switch is on
    /// </summary>
    private bool IsToggleSwitchOn{ get; set; } = true;

    /// <summary>
    /// Gets or sets the selected payment method
    /// </summary>
    private string SelectedPaymentMethod { get; set; } = "credit";
    
}

<style>
    #button-control {
        width: 170%;
        margin: 8% 0;
        text-align: left;
    }

    @@media only screen and (max-width: 500px) {
        #button-control {
            margin-left: -3%;
        }
    }

    .button-section {
        width: 80%;
        margin: auto;
    }

    #button-control .col-xs-12 {
        margin: 15px 0;
    }

    @@font-face {
        font-family: 'button-icons';
        src: url(data:application/x-font-ttf;charset=utf-8;base64,) format('truetype');
        font-weight: normal;
        font-style: normal;
    }

    .e-label {
        width: max-content !important;
    }

    .e-radio-wrapper {
        display: inline-block;
        line-height: 1;
        position: relative;
        margin-bottom: 20px;
    }

    .key-class {
        display: inline-block;
        width: 130px;
    }

    .e-button-section {
        padding-top: 0px !important;
    }
</style>
